name: aphrodite
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), the goddess (= female god) of beauty and love: a statue of Aphrodite Compare
Venus (GODDESS)
More examplesFewer examplesThe herb marjoram was thought to be a favorite of Aphrodite, the goddess of love.Aphrodite reputedly first emerged from the sea at Petra tou Romiou on the west coast of Cyprus.The towering figure was thought to depict Aphrodite, the Greek goddess of love. The temple was dedicated to the goddess Aphrodite.
